title: Dynasty Warriors: Origins - Guides Hub
description: Dynasty Warriors: Origins features the Wanderer, a lone soul who has no memory of his past. Still, his journey leads him to meet a memorable cast of characters, from cunning officials and wise strategists to sworn brothers and mighty generals. This is the era of the Three Kingdoms of China, one where the land is constantly ravaged by internecine conflict and where regional lords are hungry for power. This is the next entry in Koei Tecmo's hack-and-slash video game franchise, where bold changes and bigger battles await. Here's our Dynasty Warriors: Origins guides hub to help you on your adventure.Table of Contents [hide]Dynasty Warriors: Origins guides hub Dynasty Warriors: Origins guides hubOur Dynasty Warriors: Origins guides hub is divided into multiple categories. First, we look at a few general mechanics, followed by tips regarding officers and progression. We then discuss weapons and items that you can obtain during your playthrough.Continue Reading at GameSpot
excerpt: Take on thousands of enemies as a lone fighter with the help of our Dynasty Warriors: Origins guides hub.

html:
GameSpot may receive revenue from affiliate and advertising partnerships for sharing this content and from purchases through links.

Dynasty Warriors: Origins features the Wanderer, a lone soul who has no memory of his past. Still, his journey leads him to meet a memorable cast of characters, from cunning officials and wise strategists to sworn brothers and mighty generals. This is the era of the Three Kingdoms of China, one where the land is constantly ravaged by internecine conflict and where regional lords are hungry for power. This is the next entry in Koei Tecmo's hack-and-slash video game franchise, where bold changes and bigger battles await. Here's our Dynasty Warriors: Origins guides hub to help you on your adventure.

Table of Contents [hide]

  • Dynasty Warriors: Origins guides hub
    • General guides
    • Officers and campaign progression
    • Weapons and special items

Dynasty Warriors: Origins guides hub

Our Dynasty Warriors: Origins guides hub is divided into multiple categories. First, we look at a few general mechanics, followed by tips regarding officers and progression. We then discuss weapons and items that you can obtain during your playthrough.

General guides

Our general guides discuss a few tidbits that are important if you're just starting out. We've got several tips that are perfect for newcomers to the series, as well as veterans who want to learn about the important changes. Perhaps you also want to know how many hours you need to spare just to clear the campaign.

How long to beat the campaign

Beginner's guide: 16 things you need to know before you play

Officers and campaign progression

Gone are the days when Dynasty Warriors had over 90 characters. Now, the only playable fighter is the Wanderer. Still, you can meet various officer companions who can aid you during battles. Moreover, there are key decisions to make and side quests to complete during the campaign. And, of course, you're going to have to pursue Lu Bu whether you like it or not.

How to unlock all officers companions

How to beat Lu Bu

Chapter 3 major decision: Join Cao Cao, Liu Bei, or Sun Jian

Side quest: Search for Memories/Shards of the Past

Weapons and special items

While progressing through the game, you'll acquire all sorts of goodies. There are multiple weapon types with their own unique skills, and you can even upgrade them further. Likewise, the Old Coins you amass can be exchanged for additional rewards.

How to unlock all weapon types

How to reforge and upgrade weapons

Old Coins locations and rewards

We'll continue adding more articles to our Dynasty Warriors: Origins guides hub, so stay tuned.

Got a news tip or want to contact us directly? Email news@gamespot.com
